content: GREAT OPPORTUNITY TO GET THE CRYPTO STAMPS AT A SALE PRICEEVERYTHING IS SOLD IN A COMPLETE LOT:CS3 BLACK --> 2 UNITS (NFT ONCHAIN)CS3 BLUE  --> 1 UNITS (NFT ONCHAIN)CS3 GREEN --> 1UNITS  (NFT ONCHAIN) CS3 YELOW --> 1 UNIT UNITS CS3.1 BLACK --> 1 UNITS (only rhino)CS3.1 BLUE  --> 1 UNITS (only cat)CS3.1 GREEN --> 2 UNITS (rhino) 4 UNITS (cat) CS3.1 YELOW --> 2 UNITS (only rhino) CS1 BLACK --> 1 UNITSCS1 BLUE  --> 1 UNITSCS1 GREEN --> 1 UNITS CS2 BLACK --> 1 UNITS of each animal (dog, llama, badger, bear)CS2 BLUE  --> 1 UNITS of each animal (dog, llama, badger, bear)CS2 GREEN --> 1 UNITS of each animal (dog, llama, badger, bear)CS3 YELOW --> 1 UNIT (only badger) Starting bid: 0.015BTC with minimum increments of: 0.0005BTCShipping: Not included. Shipping will be based on location and preference (shipping from Spain)   End date and time: Time until Tuesday, July 12, 2022, 11:00:00 (Madrid time)Sniping: Bids in the last 10 minutes extend the auction to a maximum of 10 minutes after the last bid.Other:Payment due within 24 hours of auction end.Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.
